grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 箇【カ】counter for the ichi-ni-san counting system (usu. directly preceding the item being counted), a noun read using its on-yomi
箇所【カショ】passage, place, point, part
個【コ】counter for articles, counter for military units, individual
個々【ココ】individual, one by one, separate, each
